thread.title: R&D Nova Scotia
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by R&D Nova Scotia

author: R&D Nova Scotia
title: R&D Nova Scotia
text: We throughly enjoyed our trip to Australia with GO WAY Travel . The hotels were fine and the tours excellent . The highlight was the Penguin Tour on Phillips Island . Was everything perfect - No - but we adapted . We were booked on the last flight of the day from Melbourne to Sydney with a half hour stop over to Ayers Rock . We changed it to an earlier flight and made our connection but our original flight did not . I would suggest not to book the last flight when you have two other options within an hr time frame . We were sent to Kings Cannon without a tour booked , we purchased a tour from the bus driver . I would book again with GoWay
